tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart
type: Tutorial Step - Keep It in One Place

definition.text: Setting up a Time Machine will allow you to keep your data synchronized and accessible.

paragraphs.text: The Time Machine is all about synchronizing. Whether itâ€™s matching up candles with volume indicators or seeing exactly when a buy order was placed by your Trading Strategy, the time machine is your best friend in the Charting Space.
One Time Machine in the Design Space will show up as one box, or set of Charts, in the Charting Space
